## Initial setup

```{r library}
# General functionality
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(officer)

# For importing the data
library(sjmisc)
library(haven)
library(janitor)
library(countrycode)

# model evaluation
library(broom)
library(marginaleffects)
library(sandwich)
library(lmtest)

# possible speeding up models
library(speedglm)

# meta-regression
library(metafor)

# MAAS from speedglm messes with this
select <- dplyr::select
```
